ara_qurannastaleeq.name: ara-qurannastaleeq
ara_qurannastaleeq.author: Quran Nastaleeq
ara_qurannastaleeq.comments: Version 10, Original Version from qurancomplex, It requires nastaleeq fonts to view them properly

ara_qurannastaleeqc.name: ara-qurannastaleeqc
ara_qurannastaleeqc.author: Quran Nastaleeq Clean
ara_qurannastaleeqc.comments: Version 10, This version doesn't require any special font's to display properly, all non UTF-8 characters have been removed from this

ara_qurannastaleeqc1.name: ara-qurannastaleeqc1
ara_qurannastaleeqc1.author: Quran Nastaleeq Clean Sukn
ara_qurannastaleeqc1.comments: Version 10, This version has circle shaped sukoon replaced with daal shaped sukoon, to make it look like IndoPak and is usually used in India/Pakistan and neighbouring regions, It doesn't require any special font's to display properly, all non UTF-8 characters have been removed from this

ara_qurannastaleeqs.name: ara-qurannastaleeqs
ara_qurannastaleeqs.author: Quran Nastaleeq Sukn
ara_qurannastaleeqs.comments: Version 10, This version has circle shaped sukoon replaced with daal shaped sukoon, to make it look like IndoPak and is usually used in India/Pakistan and neighbouring regions, It requires fonts to display properly
